org.modelio.gproject.gproject

Class ProjectWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.gproject.gproject.ProjectWriter

  • public class ProjectWriter
extends Object
    Serialize a GProject, a IProjectFragment or a project descriptor in a XML file.
